MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH32 postcode area of Prestonpans. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:11pm. Our emergency response team are on their way to South Seton Park substation to investigate a possible blown fuse and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:43pm on Saturday, 09 January 2021
